rr_event.title: Western Avenue / A40 (Greenford)
rr_event.location: On Western Avenue / A40 between Greenford Roundabout and Church Road / A312
rr_event.description: Westbound direction. Lane one restricted due to a broken manhole cover.
rr_event.remark: Due to a raised manhole after heavy rain, lane one (of 3) remains closed westbound. Traffic is slow moving westbound with tailbacks to Northern Roundabout. Also slow traffic southbound on the A406 on approach to Hanger Lane Gyratory. Expect delays.

rr_event.title: Victoria (Westminster)
rr_event.location: VICTORIA
rr_event.description: Victoria Station Upgrade works Various road restrictions in the Victoria area as part of the continuing Victoria Station Upgrade works and the Victoria Circle development. Wilton Road is closed to all traffic except buses and taxis, diversions are in place. Allington Street is also closed. Delays are possible in the Victoria area, especially at peak times.
rr_event.remark: Due to long term works associated with the Victoria Station Upgrade and Victoria Circle Development, there are various road restrictions in place on Bressenden Place and Vauxhall Bridge Road (between Victoria Street and Neathouse Place). Allington Street is closed at Victoria Street with diversions in place. Wilton Road is closed at Neathouse Place to all traffic except buses, taxis and cycles. In addition there is a lane restriction in place eastbound on Victoria Street, on approach to Buckingham Gate for electrical works. Also, Constitution Hill is closed in both directions until 14th June to facilitate the taking down of structure's from the Queens Jubilee Celebrations, traffic is on diversion through Victoria. Traffic is moving well in the area.

rr_event.title: South Street (Enfield)
rr_event.location: At the junction of High Street
rr_event.description: Eastbound and westbound direction. Carriageway and footway reconstruction works. Taking place in four phases: Phase one: 0930hrs Thursday 31 May until 0930hrs Saturday 2 June 2012. South Street will be closed to all traffic between Scotland Green Road and High Street Ponders End. Phase two: 0930hrs Saturday 2 until 2000hrs Sunday 10 June 2012. South Street will be totally closed to buses. Phase three: 0930hrs Monday 18 June until approximately 1700hrs Sunday 2 September 2012. South Street will be made one-way with traffic flowing in the westbound direction (traffic will not be allowed to enter South Street from the High Street). Phase four: Will be the finishing course of the carriageway (surface course) and this will result in a complete road closure, but the duration should only be for a few days. These works are likely to have a knock on effect to traffic on the High Street and Nags Head Road as well as some other nearby roads.
rr_event.remark: South Street closed to all traffic between Scotland Green Road and High Street Ponders End. Expect local delays.
